verses.verse: Awake,<WH5782> awake;<WH5782> put<WH3847> on your strength,<WH5797> O Zion;<WH6726> put<WH3847> on your beautiful<WH8597> garments,<WH899> O Jerusalem,<WH3389> the holy<WH6944> city:<WH5892> for from now on<WH6258> there shall no<WH3808> more<WH3254> <WH5750> come<WH935> into you the uncircumcised<WH6189> and the unclean.<WH2931>

Shake<WH5287> yourself from the dust;<WH6083> arise,<WH6965> and sit<WH3427> down, O Jerusalem:<WH3389> loose<WH6605> yourself from the bands<WH4147> of your neck,<WH6677> O captive<WH7628> daughter<WH1323> of Zion.<WH6726>
For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> You have sold<WH4376> yourselves for nothing;<WH2600> and you shall be redeemed<WH1350> without<WH3808> money.<WH3701>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> My people<WH5971> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> aforetime<WH7223> into Egypt<WH4714> to sojourn<WH1481> there;<WH8033> and the Assyrian<WH804> oppressed<WH6231> them without<WH657> cause.<WH657>

Now<WH6258> therefore, what<WH4100> have I here,<WH6311> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that my people<WH5971> is taken<WH3947> away for nothing?<WH2600> they that rule<WH4910> over them make them to howl,<WH3213> said<WH5002> the LORD;<WH3068> and my name<WH8034> continually<WH8548> every<WH3605> day<WH3117> is blasphemed.<WH5006>
Therefore<WH3651> my people<WH5971> shall know<WH3045> my name:<WH8034> therefore<WH3651> they shall know in that day<WH3117> that I am he that does speak:<WH1696> behold,<WH2009> it is I.

How<WH4100> beautiful<WH4998> on the mountains<WH2022> are the feet<WH7272> of him that brings<WH1319> good<WH1319> tidings,<WH1319> that publishes<WH8085> peace;<WH7965> that brings<WH1319> good<WH1319> tidings<WH1319> of good,<WH2896> that publishes<WH8085> salvation;<WH3444> that said<WH559> to Zion,<WH6726> Your God<WH430> reigns!<WH4427>

Your watchmen<WH6822> shall lift<WH5375> up the voice;<WH6963> with the voice<WH6963> together<WH3162> shall they sing:<WH7442> for they shall see<WH7200> eye<WH5869> to eye,<WH5869> when the LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> Zion.<WH6726>

Break<WH6476> forth into joy, sing<WH7442> together, you waste<WH2723> places of Jerusalem:<WH3389> for the LORD<WH3068> has comforted<WH5162> his people,<WH5971> he has redeemed<WH1350> Jerusalem.<WH3389>

The LORD<WH3068> has made bare<WH2834> his holy<WH6944> arm<WH2220> in the eyes<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the nations;<WH1471> and all<WH3605> the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776> shall see<WH7200> the salvation<WH3444> of our God.<WH430>

Depart<WH5493> you, depart<WH5493> you, go<WH3318> you out from there,<WH8033> touch<WH5060> no<WH408> unclean<WH2931> thing; go<WH3318> you out of the middle<WH8432> of her; be you clean,<WH1305> that bear<WH5375> the vessels<WH3627> of the LORD.<WH3068>

For you shall not go<WH3318> out with haste,<WH2649> nor<WH3808> go<WH3212> by flight:<WH4499> for the LORD<WH3068> will go<WH1980> before<WH6440> you; and the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> will be your rear guard.<WH622>
Behold,<WH2009> my servant<WH5650> shall deal prudently,<WH7919> he shall be exalted<WH7311> and extolled,<WH5375> and be very<WH3966> high.<WH1361>
As many<WH7227> were astonished<WH8074> at you; his visage<WH4758> was so marred<WH4893> more than any man,<WH376> and his form<WH8389> more than the sons<WH1121> of men:<WH120>

So<WH3651> shall he sprinkle<WH5137> many<WH7227> nations;<WH1471> the kings<WH4428> shall shut<WH7092> their mouths<WH6310> at him: for that which<WH834> had not been told<WH5608> them shall they see;<WH7200> and that which<WH834> they had not heard<WH8085> shall they consider.<WH995>
